site_url.description: The URL of the site being analyzed

search_type.description: The type of search (e.g., web, image, video)

date.description: The date of the search analytics data

country.description: The country where the search took place

device.description: The type of device used for the search (e.g., mobile, desktop)

clicks.description: The number of times users clicked on a search result linking to the site

impressions.description: The number of times the site appeared in search results

ctr.description: Click-through rate calculated as clicks divided by impressions

position.description: The average position of the site in search results
